params._minimumPoolBadDebt: Minimum bad debt in BUSD for a pool to start auction

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._comptroller: Comptroller address of the new pool

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._minimumPoolBadDebt: Minimum bad debt in BUSD for a pool to start auction

AuctionClosed(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a auction is completed

AuctionRestarted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a auction is restarted

BidPlaced(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when a bid is placed

comptrollers(uint256).notice: Pool ID to comptroller address mapping

minimumPoolBadDebt().notice: Minimum USD debt in pool for shortfall to trigger

nextBidderBlockLimit().notice: Time to wait for next bidder. wait for 10 blocks

placeBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Place a bid in a auction

setPoolComptroller(uint256,address).notice: Called by pool registry contract whenever a new isolated pool is created

setPoolRegistry(address).notice: After Pool Registry is deployed we need to set the pool registry address

updateMinimumPoolBadDebt(uint256).notice: Update minimum pool bad debt to start auction

waitForFirstBidder().notice: Time to wait for first bidder. wait for 100 blocks
